com.bluegosling.concurrent.executors

Class WrappingScheduledExecutorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluegosling.concurrent.executors.WrappingExecutor
      • com.bluegosling.concurrent.executors.WrappingExecutorService
        • com.bluegosling.concurrent.executors.WrappingScheduledExecutorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FluentExecutorService, FluentScheduledExecutorService, Executor, ExecutorService, ScheduledExecutorService

    public abstract class WrappingScheduledExecutorService
extends WrappingExecutorService
implements FluentScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that provides a way to wrap tasks that are executed. Wrappers can perform a range of cross-cutting concerns before and after delegating to the wrapped task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected WrappingScheduledExecutorService(ScheduledExecutorService delegate)
      Constructs a new scheduled executor service that delegates to the given scheduled executor service.
